Package appv2.core

package appv2.core

Provides the core classes necessary to run this application.

Since:
2.0
Author:
mzoesch
See Also:

    Description
    appv2
    This is the entry point for the application with JavaFX.

    This package contains all necessary controller for the view.

    Provides everything that has something to do with the game cards.

  • Class
    Description
    ECardResponse
    Represents the possible responses to a card being played.
    EGameModeState
    Represents the possible states a game can be in.
    GameInstance
    Implements high-level methods relevant to the entirety of the life-cycle of the application.
    GameMode
    The rules of the game are implemented here.
    GameState
    High-level supervisor for the entirety of a game.
    PlayerController
    Represents the will of the human player.
    View
    Implements high-level methods relevant for the Graphical User Interface.
